solution_line_template: The injury would be fully healed after {pain_subsided_days}*{healing_multiplier}=<<{pain_subsided_days}*{healing_multiplier}={healing_days}>>{healing_days} days
So he would start exercising again in {healing_days}+{wait_after_healing}=<<{healing_days}+{wait_after_healing}={start_exercising_days}>>{start_exercising_days} days
He would then wait for {wait_weeks}*{days_per_week}=<<{wait_weeks}*{days_per_week}={wait_heavy_days}>>{wait_heavy_days} more days to start lifting heavy again
That means he needs to wait {start_exercising_days}+{wait_heavy_days}=<<{start_exercising_days}+{wait_heavy_days}={total_days}>>{total_days} days
